qbraid.devices.google.CirqSimulatorWrapper¶

class CirqSimulatorWrapper(name, provider, **fields)[source]¶

Wrapper class for Google Cirq Simulator objects.

Create CirqSimulatorWrapper

Parameters

  • name (str) – a Cirq supported device

  • provider (str) – the provider that this device comes from

  • fields – kwargs for the values to use to override the default options.

Raises

DeviceError – if input field not a valid options

__init__(name, provider, **fields)[source]¶

Create CirqSimulatorWrapper

Parameters

  • name (str) – a Cirq supported device

  • provider (str) – the provider that this device comes from

  • fields – kwargs for the values to use to override the default options.

Raises

DeviceError – if input field not a valid options

Methods

__init__(name, provider, **fields)

Create CirqSimulatorWrapper

device_configuration()

Return the device configuration.

run(run_input, *args, **kwargs)

Samples from the given Circuit.

set_options(**fields)

Set the options fields for the device.

Attributes

name

Return the device name.

options

Return the options for the device.

provider

Return the device provider.

vendor

Return the software vendor name.
